metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43306 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An exponential ReDoS (Regular Expression Denial of Service) can be triggered in the jquery-validation npm package, when an attacker is able to supply arbitrary input to the url2 method

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this is an issue in jquery-validation, code is not present in node-jquery

criterions.comment: civicrm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
